None.Name: Warrior Spear
None.Description: Every 2.5 seconds, unit throws her warrior spear at an enemy dealing 84 damage in a 5m radius around the target, up to 126 in total.

None.Name: Tainted Sobering
None.Description: Activate to immediately remove all buffs from a targeted hostile unit. The target will additionally be insensitive to all major buffs for 15 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
